SELECT PM_IDX ,pmd.PM_COM_CODE ,scc.COM_NAME ,PM_PART_CODE ,pc.PART_NAME as PM_PART_NAME --,bc.base_value as PM_PLANT ,PM_PART_PLANT_CODE --,pc.PART_COUNTRY as PM_COUNTRY ,PM_PART_COUNTRY ,ui.USER_NAME as PM_REG_USER ,NVL(PM_ACTIVE_YN, ' ') as PM_ACTIVE_YN ,NVL(BASE_NAME , ' ') as PM_APPROVAL_STATUS ,NVL(TO_CHAR(PM_APPROVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),' ') as PM_APPROVAL_DATE FROM SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA pmd LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_CODE pc ON pmd.PM_PART_CODE = pc.PART_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT BASE_NAME, BASE_VALUE FROM SC_BASE_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE AND GROUP_CODE='PartApproval') sbc ON pmd.PM_APPROVAL_STATUS = sbc.BASE_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_USER_INFO ui ON pmd.PM_REG_USER = ui.USER_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE scc ON scc.COM_CODE = pmd.PM_COM_CODE WHERE 1 =1
AND (PM_PART_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_PART_CODE}), '%'))
AND (PM_PART_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_PART_NAME}), '%'))
AND (ui.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{REG_USER}), '%'))
AND (PM_ACTIVE_YN = #{PM_ACTIVE_YN})
AND (PM_PART_PLANT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_PLANT}), '%'))
AND (PM_APPROVAL_STATUS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_APPROVAL_STATUS}), '%'))
AND (PM_REG_DATE > #{PM_SDATE})
AND (PM_REG_DATE <= #{PM_EDATE})

SELECT msds.MSDS_IDX , pc.PART_CODE , pc.PART_NAME , cc.COM_CODE , cc.COM_NAME , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(msds.MSDS_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + (INTERVAL '1' YEAR), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DATE FROM SC_PART_MGMT_DETAIL_MSDS msds LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA pm ON msds.PM_IDX = pm.PM_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_CODE pc ON pm.PM_PART_CODE = pc.PART_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE cc ON pc.COM_CODE = cc.COM_CODE WHERE 1 = 1
AND TO_DATE(msds.MSDS_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + (INTERVAL '1' YEAR) <= TO_DATE(#{EXP_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND (cc.COM_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_CODE}), '%'))
AND (cc.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_NAME}), '%'))

SELECT spmdd.DECL_IDX , pc.PART_CODE , pc.PART_NAME , cc.COM_CODE , cc.COM_NAME , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(spmdd.CONFIRM_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD') + (INTERVAL '1' YEAR), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DATE FROM SC_PART_MGMT_DECLARATION_DATA spmdd LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA pm ON spmdd.PM_IDX = pm.PM_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_CODE pc ON pm.PM_PART_CODE = pc.PART_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE cc ON pc.COM_CODE = cc.COM_CODE WHERE 1 = 1
AND TO_DATE(spmdd.CONFIRM_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + (INTERVAL '1' YEAR) <= TO_DATE(#{EXP_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND (cc.COM_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_CODE}), '%'))
AND (cc.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_NAME}), '%'))

SELECT spmde.ETC_IDX , pc.PART_CODE , pc.PART_NAME , cc.COM_CODE , cc.COM_NAME , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(spmde.ETC_CONFIRM_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD') + (INTERVAL '1' YEAR), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXP_DATE FROM SC_PART_MGMT_DETAIL_ETC spmde LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA pm ON spmde.PM_IDX = pm.PM_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_CODE pc ON pm.PM_PART_CODE = pc.PART_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE cc ON pc.COM_CODE = cc.COM_CODE WHERE 1 = 1
AND TO_DATE(spmde.ETC_CONFIRM_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD') + (INTERVAL '1' YEAR) <= TO_DATE(#{EXP_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND (cc.COM_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_CODE}), '%'))
AND (cc.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_NAME}), '%'))
